p: We determined the threat status for each species from the IUCN Red List ( http://www.iucnredlist.org, accessed 20 May 2015), and combined the status categories into the two groups: ‘not threatened’ (least concern and near threatened) and ‘threatened’ (vulnerable, endangered, critically endangered). Data from species that were categorized as ‘data deficient’ or for which no assessment existed at the time of analysis were removed from all analyses that examined threat status.
